resources.string: Personalize on Design from Creative Artist. COMMING SOON....
Slide Finger or Tap on Screen to change the looks
Slide Finger on lower portion of the Screen to change the intensity. Also drag the square to position the Intensity
Sliding Finger not needed. Change is applied.
Please select an Image to be saved.
Due to Memory Constraint small Image size is Saved and will take little longer.
All Images saved using this App can be viewed here. Since no Image is saved, hence this view is not shown.
Image not Found. This happened because image is manually deleted from Memory Card
Slide On Wheel and Click Center
This Filter Conflicts with Filter Used
Image Not Found. Redirecting to Main Page. Report Error to support@xpressonnet.com. Appreciate your support
Unable to save Image. Redirecting to Main Page. Report Error to support@xpressonnet.com. Appreciate your support
Image Effects Name is used. Please give a new Name
Image Effects and Filters used in any combination can be saved. These effects saved by you will show in Personalized Effects for reuse.
Unable to Show Image and Redirecting to Main Page
No Image Saved, Redirecting to Main Page
Please Selected Image from the Gallery. Redirecting to Main Page
Cannot Create My Effects as no Effects or Filters are selected.
Unable to retrieve the selected image from the Gallery. Redirecting to Main Page
Unable to connect to Google Play. Sorry for inconvinience.

XPressOn is an Image Editing App with 1000s of Image Effects and Filters. Its free with no ads.

XPressOn vision is to do more with the pictures you have taken by auto-plugging your pictures into Designs created by Professional Designers.

It will be of immense help if you can review our app in Google Play, give us your feedback, like us on Facebook Page and refer your Friends. All this you can do from XPressOn App itself by clicking on the image that appear in the home page.

Thanks for your support.
XPressOn Team
Use XPressOn to bring life to ur photographs on ur Mobile
We would love to hear your suggestion. Thankyou for your feedback.
Please review us in Google Play
Refer your Friend to download XPressOn App

Get XPressOn App for Android to quickly fix your picture, apply effects, filters, borders, etc to create stunning photo and share it on Facebook, Email, WhatsApp, etc.
Download for free https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.xpresson.android
